tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE popular_food_destinations (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  cuisine VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE restaurants (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    cuisine VARCHAR(50),
    rating FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    restaurant_id INT,
    reviewer_name VARCHAR(100),
    review_text TEXT,
    rating FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (restaurant_id) REFERENCES restaurants(id)
)

CREATE TABLE destination (
  destination_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  city VARCHAR(100),
  country VARCHAR(100),
  rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE restaurant (
  restaurant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  cuisine VARCHAR(100),
  city VARCHAR(100),
  country VARCHAR(100),
  rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE review (
  review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  destination_id UUID REFERENCES destination(destination_id),
  restaurant_id UUID REFERENCES restaurant(restaurant_id),
  reviewer_name VARCHAR(255),
  rating INT,
  comment TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  restaurant_id INT NOT NULL,
  rating INT NOT NULL,
  review_text TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (restaurant_id) REFERENCES restaurants(id)
);

CREATE TABLE restaurants (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  cuisine VARCHAR(50),
  rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  restaurant_id UUID REFERENCES restaurants(id),
  rating FLOAT NOT NULL,
  comment TEXT,
  reviewer_name VARCHAR(100)
);
